channel.title: No Way To Download Source SDK Base 2007 Without Steam ?!
channel.description:
Hi ,
I lost my Source SDK 2007 after installing a new windows on a drive different with the drive i installed the steam.
Since it was too hard with my download speed to download the app and i want to continue playing Black Mesa , i was wondering is there any way to download the Source SDK without steam ?\
Can anyone upload the app , etc?
Thanks for your attention.

item.title: No Way To Download Source SDK Base 2007 Without Steam ?!
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
No, that wouldn’t work.
Either way, that’s a shoddy excuse, you’d still have to download it. Just download it on Steam.

Read full topic
item.source: No Way To Download Source SDK Base 2007 Without Steam ?!
